posts.title: It's Hard to Forego Efficiency
posts.author: James McLayer
posts.body: We live in a world of tradeoffs. Spending some time optimizing a certain function takes your focus and time away from optimizing another. We all want everything to work perfectly, look beautiful, be intuitive and perform really well. This is true for your life as it is true for engineering.
